description: Welcome to Sunpointe! This nearly 1,900 sq. ft. END UNIT townhouse truly checks all the boxes. The main floor features a gorgeous kitchen with white shaker cabinetry, granite countertops, & stainless steel appliances, complemented by modern vinyl flooring + a convenient powder room and patio off the dining room. Upstairs offers a spacious primary bedroom with a five-piece ensuite, a full bathroom, and two additional well-sized bedrooms. The basement boasts a large media room (could be a 4th bedroom), another full bath, laundry room, storage and a covered patio. Stunning panoramic views from the main floor and primary bedroom finish this perfect place to call home. BONUS: New vinyl flooring and paint throughout!  Close to schools, shops, and transit, this home is move-in ready!
